moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Charm
moves.description: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. The target's Attack is harshly lowered.

moves.name: Water Gun
moves.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

moves.name: Agility
moves.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. It also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Lucky Chant
moves.description: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing opposing Pokémon from landing critical hits.

moves.name: Water Pulse
moves.description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. It may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Attract
moves.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

moves.name: Flail
moves.description: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. It becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

moves.name: Sweet Kiss
moves.description: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.

moves.name: Hydro Pump
moves.description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

moves.name: Aqua Ring
moves.description: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP on every turn.

moves.name: Captivate
moves.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target is charmed into harshly lowering its Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Safeguard
moves.description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status problems for five turns.
